entity.name: Labour set to announce new party leader

text: @Keir_Starmer Voters were taught to fear Corbyn, but liked his robust policies. Some say we must change; into what? We changed in 2015, to retreat behind the barricades of centrist timidity will betray every homeless person who dies, or from UC sanctioned starvation, or Tory Covid-19 inaction
